content:
/poll do you enable the "Keep bar at top of page" option for the Admin Bar on the sites you build?
Yes, I prefer the Admin bar to always be sticky at the top of the pages as I scroll
No, I prefer the Admin Bar sticky setting to be off, as is the default
@klonos Is this just out of curiosity, or you planning to open an issue re. making the 'sticky' option the default?

Just trying to get some metrics around it, so to move #788 forward if possible. I keep setting the admin bar to sticky on the sandboxes I work on (which reminds me the same thing I used to do with disabling the Overlay module in D7 :rolling_eyes: ), and then also:
a) WordPress has its admin menu on the side, which makes it available at all times; whereas with Backdrop, it is hidden when you scroll down long pages, and then you need to scroll back up to navigate elsewhere. So it is a UX issue that's always at the back of my head, and I keep being reminded of it each time I spin up a WP demo.
b) #1842 would be another way to solve this I guess, but yet again we'd have to make it the default OOTB.
c) I really like https://www.drupal.org/project/gin which also has the admin bar on the side.

@Joseph Flatt prefers the admin bar to be sticky and changes all the sites we work on. I go back and forth. Sometimes I prefer it one way and sometimes the other. I think it mostly depends on the length of the page I'm on at the time. :smile:

That Gin theme looks similar to the WordPress editing experience. I have been wanting to come up with something like that for the default themes for a while, but I have a long list and it's not very high up it.
oops, I added a new choice. Can someone delete that one? lol
No harm in that @jenlampton :+1:

...besides: https://zulipchat.com/help/create-a-poll

Once the poll is created, you'll be able to edit the name of the poll and add options, but you won't be able to edit options once they are created.

Create a poll (Zulip Help Center)
Zulip natively supports creating and editing lightweight polls. | To create a poll, send a message like | or | Once the poll is created, you'll be able to edit the name of the poll and add options, but you won't be able to edit options once they are created. | Note that anyone can add options to any poll, though only the poll creator can edit the name. | /poll must come at the beginning of the message. It is not possible to send a message that both has a poll and has any other content. | We're here to help! Email us at support@zulip.com with questions, feedback, or feature requests.
